stringParam.name: sequence
stringParam.help: Enter an identifier for a genomic contig. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Contig ID's from C. parvum whole genome sequencing project begin with 'AAEE' and contig ID's for C. hominis begin with 'AAEL'. The C. parvum Chromosome 6 independently sequenced at MRC-LMB before the whole genome project was completed is 'BX526834 '. Wild cards are permitted in this search, i.e. use AAEE* to ask for all C. parvum contigs.

stringParam.name: sequence
stringParam.help: Enter an identifier for a genomic sequence. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Wild cards are permitted in this search, i.e. use AAEE* to ask for all C.parvum contigs.

stringParam.name: sequence
stringParam.help: Sequence IDs for P. falciparum chromosomes are 'MAL1' through 'MAL14.' Sequence IDs for P. yoelii contigs begin with 'MALPY'. Sequence IDs for P. vivax contigs begin with 'ctg_'. Wild cards are permitted in this search, i.e. use MALPY* to ask for all P. vivax sequences.

flatVocabParam.name: BlastDatabaseType
flatVocabParam.help: The type of the target database (eg CDS, translated CDS, Protein)

flatVocabParam.name: BlastDatabaseOrganism
flatVocabParam.help: Organism(s) from which the sequences in the BLAST database originated
